full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RNAM RTOGS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA RIGS PA ZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010B ('DI LTAR RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BGYI PA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL PO CHE PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI SLON PO RIN PO CHE, CHO RIG PA NI STOBS KYI 'KHOR LO BSGYUR BA CHING GIS RAGS LAS BYUNG BA, JANG JONG CHEN PO CHIN WANG GI SRAS LNGA PA BSTAN SRID KYI RIG PA DANG LTAN PA, GUNG MTSAN RDO RJE AER KHE AA HAS DANG, GSO RTZE RIGS PA'I BLO GROS RGYAS PA AA CHE MTHU TAR HANG THO YON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA'ANG, NAN BTAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO KHRAL DU, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I MDZAD DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL PA, NYON MONGS KYI BRAN DU KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, SA SKYA PAn CHEN KHAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA YOD NA, DE YIS BSTAN PO RIN PO CHE @011A *, ,DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU'I SKU TSE'I RGYAL MTSAN BRTAN PA DANG, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA PO SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI PHYI NANG GI BGEGS DANG BRAL NAS, PHAN PA DANG BDE BA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
